QuestData.Title: Where the Wildkin Are
QuestData.Description:
Owlbeasts are often charged with protecting places of importance to Elune. But if her influence over them wanes or is cut off, the creatures can become dangerous.
These wildkin, unfortunately, must be dealt with. The recent disturbances in Val'sharah have driven these creatures to madness.
Once an individual is lost, there is only one way to address the problem.
I cannot bring myself to kill one of Elune's creations, but I know what must be done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Owlbeasts and $2oa Undulating Boneslimes within Lostlight Grotto.
QuestData.CompletionText: Owlbeasts are fierce protectors and dangerous when lost to us.
QuestData.RewardText: I wish it did not have to come to this, truly.
